message: Broker has advised that the customer's email address is incorrect. Current email is minimus@noemail.com and needs to be amended to maximus@noemail.co.uk.
Hi Ops, we have a new starter joining on Monday. They will need system access, credit searches, business searches and property data access.
What information about application ABC001 is currently on the system?
Broker enquiry asking for a price for their case. Can someone explain how to use the pricing matrix?
I need to introduce a template letter into the system. The template should auto-fill from the customer account. Can you help?
Where can I find the latest lending criteria?
How do I use the system funding calculator?
Customer email is wrong, needs changing to correct one.
New starter request but not sure what access they need yet.
Please can you provide information held for application XYZ999 including status and documents received.
Broker asking for pricing but no specific enquiry provided.
Where is the most up to date lending criteria document stored?
Funding calculator appears incorrect when I input values. How should it be used?
Customer for application ABC002 has requested an email update to newaddress@email.com.
Can you confirm what documents we currently hold for application ABC003?
Please explain how brokers should calculate pricing using the system.
Request to add a new standard customer letter template.
What information do we have on application DEF123?
Email change required. Current email unknown, new email is updated@email.co.uk.
Hi, could you help me locate the latest version of the lending criteria?
